title: Kanak Jha: CNBC Business News Associate
text:
Kanak Jha: CNBC Business News Associate Published 11:42 AM ET Tue, 1 May 2018 Updated 3:08 PM ET Wed, 9 May 2018 CNBC.com
"My name is Kanak Jha, and I'm currently a business news associate at CNBC.
I first learned about CNBC when I attended the CNBC Workshop at AAJA. I was interested in attending because I had a real passion for business news, but you don't have to know a lot about business news to attend. "In fact, I've learned most about the industry after coming here and working through my rotations as a news associate."
The workshop was the first place where I learned about all the different rotations you can do in the program and it was actually really immersive and very interactive. We talked to a lot of business veterans and leaders in the industry and we also got to do a simulation that showed us how the newsroom works here, which is with a lot of energy and synergy.
So if you have any interest in business news or are interested in just learning more about being a journalist, then this is definitely a workshop that you should apply for." Business News Associate Workshop at #AAJA18 | Houston | Aug 10
